metadata.author: Nicolas Delrieu
metadata.description: Comprehensive professional task dataset for Cambodia digital economy evaluation

tasks.title: SME Loan Risk Assessment
tasks.description: Evaluate loan application for a family-owned restaurant in Phnom Penh BKK1 area
tasks.occupation: Loan Officer / មន្ត្រីឥណទាន
tasks.real_world_context: Family restaurant operating 3 years, seeking expansion loan for second location. Monthly revenue $12,000, expenses $8,000
tasks.business_scenario: Requesting $50,000 loan. Collateral: restaurant equipment ($30,000) and property ($40,000). NBC regulations require 15% CAR

tasks.title: Wing Money Reconciliation
tasks.description: ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ប្រតិបត្តិការ Wing Money សម្រាប់ហាងលក់ទំនិញ
tasks.occupation: Mobile Money Agent / ភ្នាក់ងារប្រាក់ចល័ត
tasks.real_world_context: Retail shop in Kampong Cham processes 50+ Wing transactions daily. Need daily reconciliation
tasks.business_scenario: Today's transactions: 47 successful, 3 pending. Total in: $1,250, Total out: $980. Commission: $15.50

tasks.title: MFI Portfolio Analysis
tasks.description: Analyze microfinance institution portfolio performance and risk
tasks.real_world_context: Rural MFI with 5,000 borrowers, average loan $800, PAR30 at 3.5%
tasks.business_scenario: Q3 portfolio review: disbursed $2M, collected $1.8M, NPL increased to 4.2%

tasks.title: Rice Yield Optimization Plan
tasks.description: ផ្តល់ផែនការបង្កើនទិន្នផលស្រូវសម្រាប់កសិករខេត្តបាត់ដំបង
tasks.occupation: Agricultural Advisor / ទីប្រឹក្សាកសិកម្ម
tasks.real_world_context: 3 hectares rice farm, clay loam soil, small irrigation canal access, family labor
tasks.business_scenario: Previous yield: 2.5 tons/hectare. Target: 3.5 tons. Budget: $500 for inputs

tasks.title: Cashew Export Documentation
tasks.description: Prepare export documentation for cashew shipment to Vietnam
tasks.real_world_context: Kampong Thom cooperative exporting 20 tons raw cashews to Vietnam processor
tasks.business_scenario: Container ready, need phytosanitary certificate, C/O, packing list, invoice

tasks.title: Fish Farm Disease Management
tasks.description: ការគ្រប់គ្រងជំងឺត្រីនៅកសិដ្ឋានចិញ្ចឹមត្រី
tasks.occupation: Aquaculture Specialist / អ្នកជំនាញវារីវប្បកម្ម
tasks.real_world_context: 500m² tilapia pond in Takeo, fish showing white spots, 20% mortality
tasks.business_scenario: Water temp 31°C, pH 7.2, dissolved oxygen 4mg/L, 5000 fish stocked

tasks.title: Angkor Temple Tour Design
tasks.description: Design 3-day premium tour package for Japanese family
tasks.real_world_context: Japanese family of 4, first Cambodia visit, interested in history and photography
tasks.business_scenario: 5-star hotel, $1000 budget for tours, prefer Japanese guide, December visit

tasks.title: Eco-Tourism Community Proposal
tasks.description: សំណើគម្រោងទេសចរណ៍ធម្មជាតិសហគមន៍នៅមណ្ឌលគិរី
tasks.real_world_context: Mondulkiri indigenous community, elephant sanctuary, waterfall nearby
tasks.business_scenario: 20 families involved, need sustainable income, preserve culture

tasks.title: Garment Quality Inspection Report
tasks.description: Inspect export batch of polo shirts for US buyer
tasks.real_world_context: 500 units polo shirts, Ralph Lauren standards, shipping deadline tomorrow
tasks.business_scenario: AQL 2.5, previous batch had 3% defects, mainly stitching issues

tasks.title: Production Line Efficiency Analysis
tasks.description: វិភាគប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្សែស្រឡាយផលិតកម្ម
tasks.occupation: Production Manager / អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផលិតកម្ម
tasks.real_world_context: Garment factory, 50 workers, target 1000 units/day, achieving 850
tasks.business_scenario: Bottleneck at sewing station, 15% rework rate, overtime costs increasing

tasks.title: Rural Clinic Patient Triage
tasks.description: ការកំណត់អាទិភាពអ្នកជំងឺនៅគ្លីនិកជនបទ
tasks.occupation: Medical Assistant / ជំនួយការពេទ្យ
tasks.real_world_context: Rural health center, 1 doctor, 2 nurses, 20 patients waiting
tasks.business_scenario: Mix of emergency and routine cases, limited resources

tasks.title: Pharmacy Inventory Management
tasks.description: Manage medicine inventory for district hospital pharmacy
tasks.real_world_context: District hospital serving 50,000 people, 200+ medicine types
tasks.business_scenario: Monthly budget $10,000, essential drugs list, cold chain requirements

tasks.title: English Curriculum Development
tasks.description: អភិវឌ្ឍកម្មវិធីសិក្សាភាសាអង់គ្លេសសម្រាប់ថ្នាក់ទី១០
tasks.occupation: Curriculum Developer / អ្នកអភិវឌ្ឍកម្មវិធីសិក្សា
tasks.real_world_context: Public high school, Grade 10, mixed ability levels, 40 students/class
tasks.business_scenario: 4 hours/week, textbook + digital resources, prepare for national exam

tasks.title: E-Learning Module Design
tasks.description: Design online learning module for vocational training
tasks.real_world_context: TVET center, hospitality program, smartphone-based learning
tasks.business_scenario: Create module on hotel front desk operations, 2-hour content

tasks.title: E-Commerce API Design
tasks.description: Design REST API for Cambodian marketplace platform
tasks.real_world_context: Local marketplace connecting farmers to restaurants, 500+ vendors
tasks.business_scenario: Need product listing, ordering, payment (KHQR), delivery tracking

tasks.title: IT Support Documentation
tasks.description: ឯកសារជំនួយបច្ចេកទេសព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា
tasks.occupation: IT Support Specialist / អ្នកជំនួយបច្ចេកទេស
tasks.real_world_context: Government office, 50 users, Windows/Office environment
tasks.business_scenario: Common issues: password resets, printer problems, email setup

tasks.title: Store Inventory Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize inventory for convenience store chain
tasks.real_world_context: 3 convenience stores in Phnom Penh, 500+ SKUs
tasks.business_scenario: Monthly sales $50,000, 20% stockouts, 15% expired goods

tasks.title: Customer Service Script
tasks.description: ស្គ្រីបសេវាកម្មអតិថិជនសម្រាប់ហាងលក់រាយ
tasks.occupation: Customer Service Manager / អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសេវាអតិថិជន
tasks.real_world_context: Electronics retail store, high-value items, warranty issues common
tasks.business_scenario: Handle complaints, returns, warranty claims, product inquiries

tasks.title: Building Permit Application
tasks.description: ពាក្យសុំអនុញ្ញាតសាងសង់អគារពាណិជ្ជកម្ម
tasks.occupation: Construction Permit Officer / មន្ត្រីលិខិតអនុញ្ញាត
tasks.real_world_context: 5-story commercial building in Phnom Penh, mixed use
tasks.business_scenario: Submit to One Window Service, meet building codes, fire safety

tasks.title: Construction Cost Estimation
tasks.description: Estimate costs for residential development project
tasks.real_world_context: 20-unit apartment complex, Sihanoukville, 6 months timeline
tasks.business_scenario: Land cleared, need detailed cost breakdown for bank loan

tasks.title: Logistics Route Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize delivery routes for distribution company
tasks.real_world_context: Food distributor, 20 trucks, 100+ delivery points in Phnom Penh
tasks.business_scenario: Morning deliveries, traffic constraints, fuel costs rising

tasks.title: Customs Clearance Documentation
tasks.description: ឯកសារបោះបង់ទំនិញតាមគយ
tasks.occupation: Customs Officer / មន្ត្រីគយ
tasks.real_world_context: Import clearance at Sihanoukville port, electronics shipment
tasks.business_scenario: Container from China, value $50,000, needs expedited clearance

tasks.title: Cryptocurrency Exchange Compliance
tasks.description: Develop compliance framework for crypto exchange
tasks.real_world_context: New crypto exchange seeking NBC approval, $10M daily volume target
tasks.business_scenario: Need KYC/AML procedures, risk assessment, regulatory framework

tasks.title: Insurance Claim Assessment
tasks.description: វាយតម្លៃសំណើទាមទារធានារ៉ាប់រងរថយន្ត
tasks.occupation: Insurance Assessor / អ្នកវាយតម្លៃធានារ៉ាប់រង
tasks.real_world_context: Motor vehicle accident claim, Toyota Camry 2019, Phnom Penh collision
tasks.business_scenario: Front-end damage, repair estimate $3,000, policy limit $5,000

tasks.title: Organic Certification Process
tasks.description: Guide pepper farm through organic certification
tasks.real_world_context: Kampot pepper farm, 5 hectares, seeking EU organic certification
tasks.business_scenario: 3-year conversion period, need documentation and compliance plan

tasks.title: Drought Mitigation Strategy
tasks.description: យុទ្ធសាស្ត្រកាត់បន្ថយផលប៉ះពាល់គ្រោះរាំងស្ងួត
tasks.occupation: Water Resource Manager / អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងធនធានទឹក
tasks.real_world_context: Prey Veng province, 500 hectares rice cultivation, El Niño year
tasks.business_scenario: Rainfall 30% below average, 200 farming families affected

tasks.title: Hotel Revenue Management
tasks.description: Optimize pricing strategy for boutique hotel
tasks.real_world_context: 30-room boutique hotel, Siem Reap, 65% occupancy
tasks.business_scenario: High season approaching, competition from new hotels, need dynamic pricing

tasks.title: Cultural Tourism Program
tasks.description: កម្មវិធីទេសចរណ៍វប្បធម៌សម្រាប់ខេត្តក្រចេះ
tasks.occupation: Cultural Tourism Developer / អ្នកអភិវឌ្ឍទេសចរណ៍វប្បធម៌
tasks.real_world_context: Kratie province, Mekong dolphins, French colonial heritage
tasks.business_scenario: Develop sustainable tourism preserving culture and environment

tasks.title: Supply Chain Risk Assessment
tasks.description: Assess supply chain vulnerabilities for electronics assembly
tasks.real_world_context: Electronics assembly plant, components from 5 countries
tasks.business_scenario: Recent port delays, chip shortages, need contingency planning

tasks.title: Lean Manufacturing Implementation
tasks.description: ការអនុវត្តផលិតកម្មគ្មានកាកសំណល់
tasks.occupation: Production Engineer / វិស្វករផលិតកម្ម
tasks.real_world_context: Footwear factory, 200 workers, high defect rate
tasks.business_scenario: 15% defects, excessive inventory, need efficiency improvement

tasks.title: Vaccination Campaign Planning
tasks.description: Plan COVID-19 booster campaign for rural district
tasks.real_world_context: Kampong Speu district, 50,000 population, 60% vaccination rate
tasks.business_scenario: Target 80% coverage, limited cold chain, mobile teams available

tasks.title: Traditional Medicine Integration
tasks.description: គ្រោងសមាហរណកម្មឱសថបុរាណក្នុងគ្លីនិក
tasks.occupation: Healthcare Integration Specialist / អ្នកជំនាញសមាហរណកម្មសុខាភិបាល
tasks.real_world_context: District referral hospital, high demand for traditional medicine
tasks.business_scenario: Integrate safe traditional practices with modern healthcare

tasks.title: STEM Lab Setup Proposal
tasks.description: Design STEM laboratory for provincial high school
tasks.real_world_context: Kampong Cham high school, 1000 students, limited budget
tasks.business_scenario: $20,000 budget, need basic science and computer facilities

tasks.title: Adult Literacy Program Design
tasks.description: កម្មវិធីអក្ខរកម្មមនុស្សពេញវ័យ
tasks.occupation: Literacy Program Coordinator / អ្នកសម្របសម្រួលកម្មវិធីអក្ខរកម្ម
tasks.real_world_context: Rural commune, 200 adults need basic literacy, evening classes
tasks.business_scenario: 6-month program, volunteer teachers, community center venue

tasks.title: Cybersecurity Audit Report
tasks.description: Security audit for government ministry website
tasks.real_world_context: Ministry website, citizen services, personal data handling
tasks.business_scenario: Recent phishing attempts, need comprehensive security review

tasks.title: Mobile App Localization
tasks.description: បកប្រែកម្មវិធីទូរស័ព្ទជាភាសាខ្មែរ
tasks.occupation: Localization Specialist / អ្នកជំនាញបកប្រែកម្មវិធី
tasks.real_world_context: Banking app localization, 50 screens, technical terminology
tasks.business_scenario: Need Khmer translation, cultural adaptation, UI adjustments

tasks.title: E-commerce Platform Selection
tasks.description: Select e-commerce platform for SME expansion
tasks.real_world_context: Fashion retailer, 3 physical stores, expanding online
tasks.business_scenario: Budget $5,000/year, need Khmer language, KHQR payment

tasks.title: Visual Merchandising Plan
tasks.description: គម្រោងតាំងពិព័រណ៍ទំនិញក្នុងហាង
tasks.occupation: Visual Merchandiser / អ្នករៀបចំការតាំងពិព័រណ៍
tasks.real_world_context: Electronics store, Aeon Mall, high foot traffic
tasks.business_scenario: New product launch, premium placement, maximize sales

tasks.title: Green Building Certification
tasks.description: LEED certification preparation for office building
tasks.real_world_context: 10-story office building, Phnom Penh, seeking LEED Silver
tasks.business_scenario: Energy efficiency, water conservation, local materials focus

tasks.title: Construction Safety Plan
tasks.description: ផែនការសុវត្ថិភាពការដ្ឋានសំណង់
tasks.occupation: Safety Officer / មន្ត្រីសុវត្ថិភាព
tasks.real_world_context: High-rise construction site, 200 workers, monsoon season
tasks.business_scenario: Recent accidents, need comprehensive safety overhaul

tasks.title: Fleet Maintenance Schedule
tasks.description: Optimize maintenance for bus company fleet
tasks.real_world_context: 30 buses, Phnom Penh-provinces routes, aging fleet
tasks.business_scenario: Reduce breakdowns, optimize maintenance costs, ensure safety

tasks.title: Last-Mile Delivery Solution
tasks.description: ដំណោះស្រាយដឹកជញ្ជូនគីឡូម៉ែត្រចុងក្រោយ
tasks.occupation: Delivery Operations Manager / អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងប្រតិបត្តិការដឹកជញ្ជូន
tasks.real_world_context: E-commerce deliveries, Phnom Penh urban area, 500 parcels/day
tasks.business_scenario: Traffic congestion, customer expectations, cost pressures

tasks.title: Remittance Service Optimization
tasks.description: Improve international money transfer service
tasks.real_world_context: Money transfer operator, Korea-Cambodia corridor, $5M monthly volume
tasks.business_scenario: High competition, need faster service, lower fees
